title: Breakingviews TV: Around the Benz
text:
Breakingviews TV: Around the Benz 4:15pm GMT - 05:12 
The founder of Chinese carmaker Geely unveiled a $9 bln stake in Mercedes-maker Daimler. Quentin Webb and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss the surprise move, how it was done and what it could portend. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The founder of Chinese carmaker Geely unveiled a $9 bln stake in Mercedes-maker Daimler. Quentin Webb and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss the surprise move, how it was done and what it could portend.
